name: Hive Runner
description:
It's late. You probably should not have had that last drink at Hanly's bar. There is trouble afoot and the WASP's have locked down the sector. What's a runner out past curfew to do?

*For best experience please play one of the downloadable versions.

  • Avoid detection or outrun your enemies
  • Use your agility to escape by sliding through small gaps.
  • Collect the lost power cores
  • Enjoy the neon glow
Controls

WASD to move

SPACE to slide

That is all..

This is a re-imagining and spiritual successor to Hive Mind. My first ever game jam game. It is also an entry to the 32bit spring cleaning jam 2022.
